TEXT.TITLE: AOI COAL CO <AOI> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr one ct vs one ct Oper net 147,000 vs 40,000 Revs 13.5 mln vs 14.1 mln Year Oper shr five cts vs 20 cts Oper net 621,000 vs 2,274,000 Revs 54.3 mln vs 56.0 mln NOTE: 1986 net excludes tax credits of 60,000 dlrs in quarter and 218,000 dlrs in year. Results reflect acceleration of depreciation on certain classes of mining equipment that resulted in the assets being fully depreciated in 1986. Reuter
